names.pinyin: ding feng zhi dong chong ji

actions: Expels Wind-Cold and unblocks the nasal passages.
Dispels Exterior Wind and dispels Dampness.
With Xin Yi Hua, for blocked nose due to Wind-Cold.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, Nourishes Yin, Drains Fire and relieves toxicity.
Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and cools the Blood.
With Shan Dou Gen, for Internal accumulation of intense Heat.
Clears Heat and relieves Fire toxicity.
Relaxes sinews, increases Qi and Blood circulation and unblocks the channels.
Dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm and descends Rebellious Qi.
Extinguishes Wind, calms the Liver, stops spasms and tremors, subdues rising Liver Yang and alleviates pain.
With Gou Teng and Quan Xie, for acute infantile or childhood convulsions.
Extinguishes Wind, alleviates spasms, drains Liver Heat and pacifies Liver Yang.

With Quan Xie, for seizures, convulsions spasms, tics, hemiplegia due to Wind-Stroke, numbness and pain in the limbs, and stubborn migraines or trigeminal neuralgia from Liver Wind or Liver Yang Rising.
With Tian Ma, calms the Liver and extinguishes Wind.
With Tian Ma and Quan Xie, for convulsions due to Liver Wind.
Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin, calms Liver Yang and Liver Wind and alleviates pain.
Extinguishes Wind, stops tremors and convulsions, tracks down Wind, unblocks the collaterals, attacks and relieves Fire toxins and stops pain.

Drains Fire
Relieves toxicity
